mention.text: `` DONETSK , Ukraine -LRB- Reuters -RRB- - One of the leaders of eastern Ukraine 's separatist rebellion said on Monday that joining the Russian Federation would probably be an appropriate step following a weekend referendum on self-rule .
an appropriate step following a weekend referendum on self-rule
